thought: To craft a lime_stained_glass, I need to first craft 8 glass. To craft glass, I need to smelt sand. Since there is 8 sand at slot 37, I will smelt the first one into slot 14.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 37 to slot 14 with quantity 1
